5FF.F.summary: ForFarmers N.V. provides feed solutions for organic livestock farming in the Netherlands, Germany, Belgium, Poland, the United Kingdom, other European Union countries, and internationally. It offers compound feeds and blends, animal feeds and specialities, liquid co-products, raw materials and coproducts, seeds, and fertilizers. The company was founded in 1896 and is headquartered in Lochem, the Netherlands.
